content: nordic dragon tail shawl / wrap crochet pattern by me and my yarn **free pattern ** pattern available for free on my website http //www meandmyyarn me/nordicdragontailpattern a better layout printable version of the pattern with step-by-step photo tutorial is available for purchase here on ravelry video tutorial for this pattern with step-by-step instructions in how to make this shawl is on my website and youtube http //www meandmyyarn me/nordicdragontailtutorial us crochet terms charts for main pattern and edge parts crochet pattern for beginners a shawl with easy row pattern repeats and a video tutorial to make it an easy crochet pattern for beginners as well i used two skeins of schoppel wolle zauberball 100 color corner of a sofa sofaecke 100g 400 meters virgin wool per skein i did 16 section repeats to make it my size but you can make it any size you like works perfectly with scheepjes whirls and other yarns too hook 3 5 mm recommended yarn is somewhere around a 3 - 4 5 mm hook size d h / 7 but you can make this shawl with basically any yarn you like thin or thick cotton wool or whatever you like a thinner yarn means a longer more narrow and delicate outcome that needs more repeats to reach a bigger size a thicker yarn gets bigger faster and can get bulky if too thick so if you re really after the bulky warm look for the winter that s perfect if you like this pattern and want to support me in making more patterns for you to enjoy buy this pattern as a pdf-version that way you ll have a nice looking printable version that lasts forever and ever and i can keep on creating patterns to keep you happily crocheting until your hook s on fire like that would stop anyone of us from crocheting really not but anyway you get the picture - if you have any questions about your purchased pattern feel free to contact me
